actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an investment credit for buildings and structural components used as an integral part of manufacturing, production, retail or wholesale trade, extraction and certain other businesses, or which are certain research or storage facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the investment tax credit to buildings and structural components used as an integral part of manufacturing, production, retail or wholesale trade, extraction and certain other businesses, or which are certain research or storage facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an investment credit for buildings and structural components used as an integral part of manufacturing, production, retail or wholesale trade, extraction and certain other businesses, or which are certain research or storage facilities.
